_header: Under a park full prudently pight
_description: ‘Benedicta sit sancta Trinitas’ — nine 8-line stanzas with this refrain

BLHar2255.First Lines:
UNdir a park ful prudently pyghtA perillous path men passyd
                    by…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…Aue rex gentis shall ech day be ther songCallyng to the for
                    helpe in ther moost nede
BLHar2255.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 69-71.
